t_video_day_in_the_life::text_card_0::te: A day in the life follows one character throughout the story. The story may follow a literal day, or simply showcase an important part of the day. This template assumes you are following a character with a specific type of work, but the clips can be used to document anyone's day or activity. Feel free to use alternate questions if you think they may work better for you.
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_7::go: Show what your character does for fun.
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_0::go: Show us where your character lives.
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_9::go: Ask: Can you please tell us about your future?
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_3::go: Show your character ready to begin their day.
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_1::go: Show us something notable about your character’s home.
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_10::g: Show your character at the end of the day
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_4::go: Show us what your character does for a living.
t_video_day_in_the_life::title: Day in the Life Video
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_5::go: Ask: Can you please go ahead and tell us about what you do?
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_6::go: Show us the most important thing about your character’s work.
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_8::go: Show where your character ends the day.
